name: Syllabits
description:
Learn English vocabulary while having fun!

Features:

  • 60 hand-crafted unique levels.
  • Multiple solutions to each puzzle.
  • Leaderboards (iOS and Android only; on ARM Macs, you can play the iOS version to get access to the Leaderboards).
  • A Wordle-like daily riddle to assemble a hidden word from syllabits.
  • Check word definitions online, and translate them (if your locale is other than English).
  • Listen to the pronunciation of words (iOS only).
  • Light & dark modes.

Requisites:

  • Windows: Intel PC with Windows 10 or higher.
  • Mac: Intel or ARM Mac, with macOS Catalina 10.15 or higher.
  • Browser: a browser that supports WebGL 1.0.
  • Android:  Android 8 Oreo or higher.
  • iOS: iOS 10 or higher.
